description:
This game is a prototype its working for now but we will complete it ASAP,

The game is about sparta in 300 movie and what happend after King Leonidas kiks the man in the hole

you can tilt your mobile left or right to avoid obstacles IN THE RIGHT TIME.

Collect coins and booster, coins will let you able to buy booster and skins and continue the game when you lose without restart from tge begining, and boosters will help you avoid and destroy obstacles
